meanings.definition: profilists: a person who creates profiles
meanings.sent1: The profilists at the company design profiles for social media.
meanings.sent2: The profilists on the team are skilled at crafting engaging profiles.
meanings.sent3: The profilists decided to create a profile for their pet cat, making it look like a celebrity.
meanings.sent4: She was a profilist of words, carefully crafting each profile to capture the essence of the individual.
meanings.sent5: The profilists' profiles were so detailed, they brought characters to life on the screen.

meanings.definition: profilists: relating to the creation of profiles
meanings.sent1: The website offers profilists services for those looking to enhance their online presence.
meanings.sent2: The profilists tools helped in customizing the profile layout.
meanings.sent3: The profilists theme for the website made it stand out among the rest.
meanings.sent4: Her profilists touch transformed the plain profile into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The profilists design elements added a professional look to the profile.

meanings.definition: profilists: the act of creating profiles
meanings.sent1: The profilists of the team worked tirelessly to complete the profiles before the deadline.
meanings.sent2: The profilists involved in the project ensured each profile was unique.
meanings.sent3: The profilists' profile creation process was like putting together a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: In the world of social media, the profilists' work was akin to painting portraits.
meanings.sent5: The profilists' dedication to profile creation shone through in their attention to detail.
